comment.body: Well Sunde cut right to the meat of this issue, but also having a dvd isnt a guarantee to have complete control over your content, and cd's gets loaded with more crap software all the time, so seems perhaps piracy is the way of the future.

Proprietary could mean one of two things, 1) they might not like the way the code looks, dont want to have that public. 2) they might actually do something in the background that users might not appreciate.

Isn't it getting a little insane that translation of speech from a movie is not infringing copyright, is copyright even that strong a protection, from what I know it shouldn't be, well only one thing to say, I am happy to not live in sweden.
